replies.body:
Racism and/or bullying is not allowed on any circumstances whatsoever. No matter what you were called at before, do not retaliate back. Ever. 
Two things you can do to prevent this or punish the player: 
1. Report! If a staff member does not come, report once more. If a staff member still does not come, take a few screenshots of the bullying and report it online. 
2. Communicate with the player. Most players here are intelligent enough to create a compromise, this sometimes works, but at least give it a try! ^_^ 

Because both sides do not seem to agree at all in this situation and is not giving evidence at all, both of you could submit an Online Report if you do have screenshots showcasing what happened in this scenario and if you believe that the  opposing player's language is strong enough for a temp-ban. 
Like Archadonic said, on behalf of your staff team, we are sorry for your trouble and you had to deal with this.
